name: TooltipSearch
description: A search component for BitQuery VA-App: zoom and filter. Performs search by various parameters, e.g. package, author name etc. The results are presented in two ways: the list of found items is displayed in the search tooltip, whereas the corresponding nodes in the main visualization are highlighted in red.
author: Lukas Borke <lukas@borke.net>, Svetlana Bykovskaya <bykovskaya.svetlana@gmail.com>
